name: GhostBlock
description:
DISCLAIMER

This was the first game I made and also my first game jam, back in april  2018. Also, I created it along with https://twitter.com/EspTactic & https://twitter.com/jotaccb

Hi there! We are so happy to show the world our first game!

This is how it goes:

You are a ghost. Well, that's cool, isn't it? Oh, so it seems that you can't jump high enough... Maybe you need...

...another hand?

Team with your best mate to help each other reach the end of this creepy castle!

----IMPORTANT----

Have in mind that this is a game that was born from a Game Jam, and this release is actually the Game Jam version, with some minor fixes. By the way, we achieved the 'Audience Award' and  'Best Game' awards!

We do not own the tiles, sprites, music or sound!

Ghost: https://lionheart963.itch.io/wizard

Music: https://www.looperman.com/
